title: Kekko Kenkou Kazoku
original_name: ケッコーケンコウ家族
sinopse: After the death of her father caused by illness, Mitsuko has moved into her uncle's house. She discovers a very weird family, obsessed with their health. First reticent, Mitsuko learns from them that eating well and having a good life hygiene is essential to be happier.
